subject: JFC Unit  Q.
msgSnippet: Hi Folks, We have just started to use JFC Unit to unit test our GUI s.  Currently we have version 0.4 beta.  I was wondering when the release version is going
messageBody:
Hi Folks,

We have just started to use JFC Unit to unit test our GUI's. Currently we have version 0.4 beta. I was wondering when the release version is going to be ready?

Regards,

Brendan.

PS I know that strictly speaking this is not the correct mailing list, but I thought one of you guys would know :)
